alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 2:48PM EDT until September 26 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fountain County in west central Indiana... Southwestern Warren County in west central Indiana... North central Vermillion County in west central Indiana... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 248 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Covington, or 10 miles east of Danville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... West Lebanon around 305 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 4 and 7. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
